movementAbilities.name: Pounce I
movementAbilities.description: Jump, on landing select 1 target within [MELEE RANGE]: 10 + [MARTIAL LEVEL] + [STR] or knock [PRONE].

movementAbilities.name: Pounce II
movementAbilities.description: Jump, on landing select multiple targets within [MELEE RANGE]: 10 + [MARTIAL LEVEL] + [STR] or knock [PRONE].

movementAbilities.name: Teleport I, CD (3)
movementAbilities.description: Teleport to an unoocupied Space up to 9m away

movementAbilities.name: Teleport II, CD (2)
movementAbilities.description: Teleport to an unoocupied Space up to 18m away

movementAbilities.name: Teleport III
movementAbilities.description: Teleport to an unoocupied Space up to 18m away

supportAbilities.name: Heal I
supportAbilities.description: Heal, [MEELE RANGE] reach, 1 target, [LIGHT SPELL DAMAGE]

supportAbilities.name: Heal II
supportAbilities.description: Heal, [MEELE RANGE] reach, 1 target, [MEDIUM SPELL DAMAGE]

supportAbilities.name: Heal III
supportAbilities.description: Heal, [MEELE RANGE] reach, 1 target, [HEAVY SPELL DAMAGE]

supportAbilities.name: Buff I
supportAbilities.description: Target 1 creature within 6m that creature recieves a beneficial Tier I Status Effect for the remaining fight as long this creature is alive.

supportAbilities.name: Buff II
supportAbilities.description: Target 1 creature within 6m that creature recieves a beneficial Tier II Status Effect for the remaining fight as long this creature is alive.

supportAbilities.name: Buff III
supportAbilities.description: Target 1 creature within 6m that creature recieves a beneficial Tier III Status Effect for the remaining fight as long this creature is alive.

supportAbilities.name: Command I
supportAbilities.description: Target 1 creature lower [LEVEL] than yourself. That creature can use their [REACTION] and move 3 [MP] and make a Basic Attack

supportAbilities.name: Command II
supportAbilities.description: Target up to 3 creatures within 7.5m lower [LEVEL] than yourself. That creature can use their [REACTION] and move 3 [MP] and make a Basic Attack

reactionAbilities.name: Unnatural Dodge
reactionAbilities.description: When hit by an [ATTACK] halve the damge recieved by that [ATTACK].

reactionAbilities.name: Sentinel
reactionAbilities.description: When enemy moves into [MELEE RANGE], make a Basic Attack.
